channel.title: Something wrong?
channel.description:
Ok so, upon being promoted, i was made aware that we use a forum feature to handle the server bans now. I was given this link to handle bans: http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups
To ban players we use a forum feature, located here (Moderator CP): http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups You add their forum name and they are unable to login, secondly, you must record all bans within the recording sticky in the staff section - this is a must, once the ban has expired you must make clear of that on the topic, for example:
the problem is when i go to that link, i get taken to the moderation center home, and there is nothing along the lines adding users to a group do i not have access to that page? http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups;sa=members;group=86 yields the same result: moderation center home

item.title: Something wrong?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Yes, it works now, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Something wrong?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Yea, that’s right, sorry. SMF doesn’t allow me to specify a group to edit groups, I have to add each user in one-by-one…

edit:
Should be fixed now, can you confirm badger and/or phaze one.

Read full topic

item.title: Something wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Oh, one second…

I think you still need to be added to the group thing for permission to use the feature.

Read full topic

item.title: Something wrong?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Ok so, upon being promoted, i was made aware that we use a forum feature to handle the server bans now.

I was given this link to handle bans:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups

To ban players we use a forum feature, located here (Moderator CP): http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups

You add their forum name and they are unable to login, secondly, you must record all bans within the recording sticky in the staff section - this is a must, once the ban has expired you must make clear of that on the topic, for example:

the problem is when i go to that link, i get taken to the moderation center home, and there is nothing along the lines adding users to a group

do i not have access to that page?

http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=moderate;area=viewgroups;sa=members;group=86

yields the same result: moderation center home

Read full topic
